_header: Spend thy time some other way
_description: Advice to youths to leave women alone — four couplets

CamTCC1283.Transcription:
Spend thy time some ower wayCome folish youth leave coarting
                    clayBe a woman what she canShe is not worth the worst of
                    manQuench thy flames & bid them dyeReason biddes the & not
                    IShes a woman goe noe higherAnd thats enough to coule thy
                    fire
